name: limitlessness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or state of having no limits: Nothing prepares you for the limitlessness of the Sahara. When I see the moon come up over that vast expanse of water, it reminds me of limitlessness and freedom.
More examplesFewer examplesHe understands the limitlessness of the medium of animation and plays gleefully with perception. Maths made me consider the limitlessness of the mind and what we can do with it.I took up fishing because of the limitlessness that the sea seems to offer.
